product_name: Horny Toad Rizzo Sleeveless Shirt - Women's
long_description: Button on the women's delightfully cool, sweet, 100% organic cotton Rizzo Sleeveless Shirt from Horny Toad for work, play or a milkshake at the drive-in on any hot day. Easy-care organic cotton chambray is super soft and lightweight; organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Up-close, the print is reminiscent of the rings of Saturn, and from a distance looks like woodblock stamps. Curved front and back yoke with gathers. Horny Toad Rizzo Sleeveless Shirt for women has a full button front, contoured back seams and a curved hem with vents.
short_description: Button on the women's delightfully cool, sweet, 100% organic cotton Rizzo Sleeveless Shirt from Horny Toad for work, play or a milkshake at the drive-in on any hot day.
